### 2. Trust Banner Component
- **Removed:** "Canadian-Friendly" trust badge
- **Added:** "Global Community" badge with Users icon

### 3. Global Notice Component (formerly CanadianNotice)
- **Component Renamed:** CanadianNotice ‚Üí GlobalNotice (with backward compatibility)
- **Icon Changed:** MapPin ‚Üí Globe
- **Title Updated:** "Built for Canadian Crypto Investors" ‚Üí "Built for Crypto Investors Worldwide"
- **Description Updated:** Multi-currency support (USD, EUR, CAD, and more) + global exchanges

### 4. App Layout Metadata
- **Description:** Removed "Canadian-friendly", added "worldwide"
- **Locale:** Changed from "en_CA" to "en_US"
- **Keywords:** Removed "canada", added "AI" and "BB"
- **OpenGraph/Twitter:** Updated all social metadata to global messaging

### 5. Landing Page
- **Import:** Updated to use GlobalNotice component
- **SEO:** Now optimized for global search rankings
